Package com.nmr.repository

Class CustomerRepo

java.lang.Object
com.nmr.repository.CustomerRepo
@Repository
public class CustomerRepo
extends java.lang.Object
The spring annotation 'repository' indicates that this is a repository class, and that it can be used for encapsulating, storage, retrieval and search behavior.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Customer createCustomer​(Customer customer)

  • Method Details

    • createCustomer

      public Customer createCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Method: 'createCustomer' makes an SQL call and inserts the customer information given in the HTML 'create customer' tab into the MySQL database. Uses the JDBC template to execute the SQL query.
      Parameters:
      customer -
      Returns:
      null

    • fetchAll

      public java.util.List<Customer> fetchAll()
      Method: 'fetchAll' makes an SQL call which selects everything from the customer table. The method uses the Spring RowMapper which automatically maps the attributes of our customer objects.
      Returns:
      JDBC template

    • findCustomerById

      public Customer findCustomerById​(int id)
      Method: 'FindCustomerById' makes an SQL call which selects a specific customer from the database. It uses the Spring rowMapper to map the attributes of the object and creates a customer object.
      Parameters:
      id - - The method takes an id given by the pathVariable annotation in our HomeController.
      Returns:
      - The method returns the specific customer which is used when updating a customer and when retrieving specific customer information for an invoice.

    • deleteCustomer

      public java.lang.Boolean deleteCustomer​(int id)
      Method: 'deleteCustomer' makes an SQL call which deletes a specific customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:

      Method: 'updateCustomer' makes an SQL call which updates the information for a specific customer
      Parameters:

      customer -
      Returns:
